chat.msg: hola, q tal? ready to go?
yes
cool! i'm right at the starting point, facing the twig that leads to a tiger island
where do we go?
go towards tiger island and the twig staying to the left
gotcha, at tiger island now
heard its growl! where to next?
continue straight across the island and across a twig past the parrot on the right
alright, walked past the parrot, waved hi! what's up next?
continue past the parroand and between the elephant , continue around the island and go to the rocks
roger that, danced around the elephant and reached the rocks
where now?
go across the rocks and say hi to the frog and them leave frog island and go across the back of the alligator
done! crossed rocks, greeted the frog, and went past the snappy crocodile
what's our next move?
cross the next rock the n 2 more rocks and say hi to the giraffe stay left cross the path and twig to the snake and continue to the treasure
crossed rocks, said hi to the giraffe, careful of the snake, and yes! found the treasure! *finished* you're the best guide ever!
hey!!! ya comenzamos?
hi
perfect! now, take a few steps to your left, heading towards the florist stand
careful not to bump into the wooden bench though!
ok went left towards log
great job! now, pull a u-turn and head back the way you came
you are aiming to get back to our furry friend. wasn't expecting that, were you?
ok Where di I start the yellow dog
nah, don't go to the yellow dog. instead, head down the map, going south
keep going until you spot another white dog. this one has a red and white picnic blanket
ok I am at the picnic dog
awesome! now, continue on your path over the mat and that delicious bowl of berries
but don't eat them, buddy! your next direction is west
ok
awesome! now see that wooden branch? that's gonna be our bridge
cross the river to the north
across
great job! now, give the bush a wide berth and circle it from the right
head towards the florist stand
at florist
great! now, turn to your left and head west, underneath the stand
see the big bridge with two cyclists? you're doing great! let's keep going!
ok
awesome! just go past the bridge
spot the old people on the bench reading newspapers?
at old people
perfect! now, move a bit to the south between the old folks and another wooden branch
let's get you to the green bush next to the end of that branch
there
you're doing excellent! now, squeeze between that branch and the bush and head east
not too far, though! let's take it slow and steady
ok
great! now, head a bit more east
and. voila! see that young, brown deer? that's our last marker! congrats!
hola, q tal? ready to go?
lets go
alright, i'm at the tent at the north
where do i go next?
had past the dog around the campfire  past the blue car
alright, just passed the dog by the fire, now i'm standing right near the blue car
what's the next move?
south past the telescope and around to the cabinm
gotcha, going past the telescope now
oh, hey, there's a cabin surrounded by rocks. this the final stop?
yup you are the
cool, reached the cabin
*finished* that was fun!
hola, q tal? ready to play?
kts go
perfect! head southwest under the first palm tree, then make a right by the second
after that, take a sharp left before the third tree towards the south. got it?
at the dog
great! now, walk slightly to your left, then take a right turn going south
keep going!
ok at the crab
awesome! now turn right and walk along the big rock
keep going west in the water. you're doing amazing!
at shark
wow, you're quick! make a sharp right here
ipsum up!
ok where now
back to the land mate, between the medium rock and the bright ball
then make your way north
by speaker
right on! now veer slightly left, head northwest between the red tent and that big speaker
ok at cliff north of tent
great! now make a semi-circle around the tent, then go southwards but stop before the water! can you see a red kayak there?
at red kyak
perfect! now turn right, going west, staying under the kayak
